```{r setup, eval=FALSE}
library(ausbushfire)
```

This package includes Fire Weather Index(FWI) and maximum value of the monthly severity rating(MSR) data from 1978 to 2019, showing the risk of bushfire in New South Wales. 

You can load data by using function below:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
data <- fwi_data
```

You can use shiny app to visualize the data:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
run_fwi_dashboard()
```
